sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function About() { return (

Hi, I'm Tyler Hooks.
I'm a Software Engineer
interested in React Development and UI engineering.

This portfolio site was implemented using React.js as well as Tailwind CSS for styling, and Netlify.
Please checkout the Git repository for more information. In time, I plan on adding more projects to this site and can't wait to share what I've learned and the many things I'm passionate about!

Work With Me See My Past Work

Hero Image HERE

); }
